title: You update and every tab is gone!
content: This new update, every tab is closed! Annoyed is an understatement. This has never happened before. Really really annoyed to the point of changing browsers after using this for years now.
creator: jlee000069

title: Request for Assistance with Mozilla Firefox Performance Issues
content:
Dear Mozilla Firefox Support Team,

I hope this letter finds you well. I am writing to express my concerns and seek assistance with some persistent performance issues I have been experiencing while using Mozilla Firefox.

Over the past few weeks, I have noticed a significant decline in the performance of Mozilla Firefox, specifically in terms of webpage loading times and the functionality of multimedia content, such as videos. Many websites that used to load quickly now take an unusually long time to open, and, in some cases, they do not load at all. Additionally, when attempting to stream videos, I encounter frequent buffering and playback issues, which have not been a problem when using alternative web browsers.

I have been a loyal user of Mozilla Firefox for many years and greatly appreciate the browser's commitment to privacy and security. However, the recent performance issues I have encountered are affecting my productivity and overall browsing experience. I have attempted to troubleshoot these issues on my own by clearing my browser cache, disabling extensions, and updating Firefox to the latest version. Despite these efforts, the problems persist.

I am writing to request your assistance in resolving these issues and restoring the smooth and efficient performance of Mozilla Firefox on my system. I rely on this browser for various online activities, including work-related tasks and research, and the current situation is hindering my ability to do so effectively.

To help diagnose and address these problems, I have included some relevant information about my system below: 

   Operating System: Windows 11    Mozilla Firefox Version: Latest    Internet Connection: 50mbps of fiber optic connection

I kindly request that your support team investigate the issues I have described and provide guidance on how to resolve them. If any additional information or diagnostics are needed from my end, please do not hesitate to let me know, and I will gladly cooperate in any way possible.

I value Mozilla Firefox as a browser and hope to continue using it as my preferred choice. Your prompt attention to this matter would be greatly appreciated. Please respond to this letter at your earliest convenience, either by email or through any other preferred method of communication.

Thank you for your time and assistance in addressing these performance issues. I look forward to your prompt response and resolution of the problems I am encountering.
creator: shahzebjadoon31.sj

title: I need to update payment information for Firefox VPN
content: I need to update payment information for Firefox VPN. Where can I do that?
creator: jameskmills

title: Unable to scroll to beginning of Youtube sub list
content: I used to be able to scroll to the bottom of my Youtube subscription list, to see the very first posted videos of all of my subscriptions, going back to the first days of Youtube in 2005. Granted, not all of the videos would show up, and I don't know if that is a Youtube problem or a Firefox problem, but most of the videos would be there. Now, after going back less than a year in the archive, the scrolling just kind of peters out. Firefox becomes unresponsive to any key press or mouse click, and all I can do is quit the program. What has changed? Has Firefox gotten even worse at memory management? it was always a total pig with memory, but has it reached the point where it just plain malfunctions and can't recover? If that is the case, then Firefox devs had better get their spit together and work on optimization. I really don't want to have to start using Edge, thank you, no. I only use Edge to view PDFs.
creator: kurtfaasse

title: Authentication Issue
content:
Hello,

I tried to login to the account and it asks me for 2 step authentication. I tried it in my google authenticator since you mentioned here the list of devices (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/secure-firefox-account-two-step-authentication). Unfortunately its not working. I just scan the QR and entered the numbers generated and it shows error only. Kindly view the screenshot. Its irritating us alot and I was trying to fix this issue from yesterday there is no solution for this posted on your website. Even I tried the PC version Authy 2 step authentication app and its not working too. Kindly fix this issue as soon as possible.

title: opening links from other apps
content: When I click on a link in my email, or from YouTube, it won't open in Firefox. Firefox is my default browser. The link starts to load properly, then goes back and my home page loads instead. I tried closing the apps and restarting them, tried updating apps, restarting phone and still can't get the link to open properly. Anybody have a clue what's wrong? I am web app illiterate and desperately need assistance.

title: uninstall
content: I want to uninstall Firefox. It is on my desktop as a shortcut. When I try to uninstall from the shortcut it takes me to add/remove programs where I do not see it listed. I have a HP 17-x173dx laptop running 64bit Windows 10.
creator: csrampley

title: Don't close tabs on exit
content:
I prefer to have all my previous tabs open when I start up Firefox, which means that I don't want them to close upon exit. Recently, Firefox started closing my tabs upon exit, even though: 

- I tried both hitting the X and choosing Exit from the hamburger menu - I have checked "Open previous windows and tabs" upon startup in settings - I have not checked "Delete Cookies and Site Settings when Firefox is closed"

- I have the option "Firefox will remember history" selected 

- I do not open in Private Browsing mode

What other settings do I need to change? Debra
creator: dbarngrover

title: 2 websites will not open in Browzer
content: I have 2 bank websites that will not open in browser. I have used these websites for a decade or longer. This issue started about a week ago. I have restarted computer, run antivirus, trouble shoot Firefox, refresh Firefox. Still no change. I can access any other website I want without problems, The websites will open in Android and Kindle, but not windows Firefox or Chrome or Safari. Any and all help would be most appreciated.
creator: herbsheb

title: Website won't refresh.
content: When I update my website, I can't get it to refresh/reload on Firefox. It reloads on other browsers. Other websites reload on Firefox when I click on the reload/refresh symbol, just this one website won't refresh.
creator: rfrench70

title: Bookmarks
content:
I have just moved from Edge to Firefox as my default browser. I have successfully imported my Favorites from Edge. However, I have two issues that I have not been able to remedy.

Now that I have imported into Bookmarks, some items are shown under Bookmarks while other are shown under Other Bookmarks. Is there a way to merge the two, or will I have to move them individually?

Also, is it possible to have only my most used items show on the toolbar individually from left to right, and still show the Bookmark icon where everything else is listed on the right?
creator: bdbouchillon

title: Viewing/saving all history
content: I used to be able to view all of my Firefox history but I noticed today that when I searched for old tabs, they wouldn't show up. When I went to view manage history to look, I found that there are only history tabs for Today, Yesterday, and Last 7 days. There is no more all history and I can't find anything older than 7 days ago. I looked at my privacy preferences and it's still set for Firefox to remember all history. Entering troubleshoot mode did nothing to fix the issue, either. How can I make it so Firefox remembers history older than 7 days? Why did it stop?
